title: Watch Party — Robert Morris
description: Join fellow Mountaineers for our season opener watch party. Family friendly!

title: Watch Party — at Pittsburgh
description: Bring your gold and blue! Raffles and giveaways during halftime.

title: Watch Party — at UCF
location: Capital Ale House, 4024 Cox Rd, Glen Allen, VA 23060
description: Join fellow Mountaineers as we watch WVU take on UCF! Doors open at 12:30 PM, kickoff at 1:00 PM. Great food, drinks, and Mountaineer spirit!
